name: Love Lies Bleeding [DEMO]
description:
In a last-ditch effort to improve your grades, your anatomy and physiology professor set you up with a tutor. One of the med students that used to take the class. She's a dedicated student and loves what she does... but perhaps she loves it a bit too much. Will you be a help or a hinderance?

This demo was made for a 3 week game jam from Mr. Fishess' renpy class. As of now it is SFW however that will change in development.

Warnings: Hospital themes, human experimentation, screen flashing, implied necrophilia and manipulation

More warnings will be added as the game progresses

If you're interested in development or you want to tell me what you think, my tumblr is here
